text.__SUMMARY__:
Salvia curticalyx is a species of flowering plant in the family Lamiaceae that is native to Ecuador.
Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests.
text.Sources: Montúfar, R. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Salvia curticalyx". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T45569A11005032. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T45569A11005032.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
